even as<WG2531> those who<WG3588> from<WG575> the beginning<WG746> were<WG1096> eyewitnesses<WG845> and<WG2532> servants<WG5257> of the word<WG3056> delivered<WG3860> them to us,<WG2254>

it seemed good<WG1380> to me also,<WG2504> having traced<WG3877> the course<WG3877> of all things<WG3956> accurately<WG199> from the first,<WG509> to write<WG1125> to you<WG4671> in order,<WG2517> most excellent<WG2903> Theophilus;<WG2321>
that<WG2443> you might know<WG1921> the certainty<WG803> concerning<WG4012> the things<WG3056> in which<WG3739> you were instructed.<WG2727>

There was<WG1096> in<WG1722> the days<WG2250> of Herod,<WG2264> the king<WG935> of Judea,<WG2449> a certain<WG5100> priest<WG2409> named<WG3686> Zacharias,<WG2197> of<WG1537> the priestly division<WG2183> of<WG1537> Abijah.<WG7> He had a wife<WG1135> of<WG1537> the daughters<WG2364> of<WG1537> Aaron,<WG2> and<WG2532> her<WG846> name<WG3686> was Elizabeth.<WG1665>

They<WG1161> were<WG2258> both<WG297> righteous<WG1342> before<WG1799> God,<WG2316> walking<WG4198> blamelessly<WG273> in<WG1722> all<WG3956> the commandments<WG1785> and<WG2532> ordinances<WG1345> of the Lord.<WG2962>

But<WG2532> they<WG846> had<WG2258> no<WG3756> child,<WG5043> because<WG2530> Elizabeth<WG1665> was<WG2258> barren,<WG4723> and<WG2532> they<WG846> both<WG297> were<WG2258> well advanced<WG4260> in<WG1722> years.<WG2250>
Now<WG1161> it happened,<WG1096> while<WG1722> he<WG846> executed the priest<WG2407>'s office before<WG1725> God<WG2316> in<WG1722> the order<WG5010> of his<WG846> division,<WG2183>
according to<WG2596> the custom<WG1485> of the priest<WG2405>'s office, his lot was<WG2975> to enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> the temple<WG3485> of the Lord<WG2962> and burn incense.<WG2370>
The<WG2532> whole<WG3956> multitude<WG4128> of the people<WG2992> were<WG2258> praying<WG4336> outside<WG1854> at the hour<WG5610> of incense.<WG2368>
An angel<WG32> of the Lord<WG2962> appeared<WG3700> to him,<WG846> standing<WG2476> on<WG1537> the right side<WG1188> of the altar<WG2379> of incense.<WG2368>
Zacharias<WG2197> was troubled<WG5015> when<WG1492> he saw<WG1492> him,<WG2532> and fear<WG5401> fell<WG1968> upon<WG1909> him.<WG846>

The<WG2532> angel<WG32> answered<WG2036> him,<WG846> "I<WG1473> am<WG1510> Gabriel,<WG1043> who<WG3588> stands<WG3936> in the presence<WG1799> of God.<WG2316> I<WG2532> was sent<WG649> to speak<WG2980> to<WG4314> you,<WG4571> and<WG2532> to bring<WG2097> you<WG4671> this<WG5023> good news.<WG2097>

After<WG3326> these<WG3778> days<WG2250> Elizabeth,<WG1665> his<WG846> wife,<WG1135> conceived,<WG4815> and<WG2532> she hid<WG4032> herself<WG1438> five<WG4002> months,<WG3376> saying,<WG3004>

"Thus<WG3779> has<WG4160> the Lord<WG2962> done<WG4160> to me<WG3427> in<WG1722> the days<WG2250> in<WG3739> which he looked at<WG1896> me,<WG851> to take away my<WG3450> reproach<WG3681> among<WG1722> men.<WG444>"

Now<WG1161> in<WG1722> the sixth<WG1623> month,<WG3376> the angel<WG32> Gabriel<WG1043> was sent<WG649> from<WG5259> God<WG2316> to<WG1519> a city<WG4172> of Galilee,<WG1056> named<WG3686> Nazareth,<WG3478>

to<WG4314> a virgin<WG3933> pledged<WG3423> to be married to a man<WG435> whose<WG3739> name was<WG3686> Joseph,<WG2501> of<WG1537> the house<WG3624> of<WG1537> David.<WG1138> The virgin<WG3933>'s name<WG3686> was Mary.<WG3137>

But<WG1161> when she saw<WG1492> him,<WG1298> she was greatly troubled at<WG1909> the<WG846> saying,<WG3056> and<WG2532> considered<WG1260> what kind of<WG4217> salutation<WG783> this<WG3778> might be.<WG1498>

Fear<WG5401> came<WG1096> on<WG1909> all<WG3956> who lived around<WG4039> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> these<WG5023> sayings<WG4487> were talked about<WG4039> throughout<WG1722> all<WG3650> the hill country<WG3714> of Judea.<WG2449>
